MTM Feature Request Generator

Create comprehensive feature requests with technical specifications

This prompt helps you create detailed feature requests for the MTM application. Use it when you want to add new functionality or improve existing features. It generates complete technical specifications, implementation plans, and testing strategies.

Real-World Example:

You're tasked with adding a new inventory search feature...

  1. Open GitHub Copilot Chat in VS Code
  2. Type: /mtm-feature-request
  3. Describe your inventory search requirements
  4. Follow the generated template
  5. Review technical implementation plan
  6. Validate against MTM architectural patterns
